EmailTemplate.name: 202104_Global_GDT_User-Growth_We-Have-Got-You-Covered.GDT_User-Growth_We-Have-Go
EmailTemplate.subject: We’ve got you covered
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Shop and sell with confidence
Free and instant access. Checkout online on your schedule and when you register, you immediately enjoy a free membership to our marketplace.
Transparency for easy checkout. Our Blockchain enabled technology eliminates ambiguity from transaction and provides the buyer part history on the listing detail.
Variety and choices. Shop inventory on over 94 active storefronts from across the globe.
A little something to start. Use promo code FIRSTORDER to get *$100 off your first online order. SEARCH NOW <https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth> *Promotion details: $100 discount taken off at checkout, must be on a minimum order purchase of $500 from Honeywell Aerospace Trading’s storefront. <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/]]>
